title: Readout of Jared Kushner and Jason Greenblatt’s Meeting with Ambassador Haley and Secretary-General Guterres – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Foreign Policy	

Issued on:
June 15, 2018
Senior Advisor Jared Kushner and Special Representative for International Negotiations Jason Greenblatt met in New York City today with United States Ambassador to the United Nations Nikki Haley and United Nations Secretary-General António Guterres.  They had a productive discussion about the efforts of the United States to promote peace in the Middle East and to meet humanitarian needs in Gaza.  They also discussed recent actions at the United Nations.
